Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Reproductive System Disorder/Male Reproductive System Disorder/Penile Disorder/Penile Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Balanitis/Balanitis Xerotica Obliterans
Male Urogenital Diseases/Genital Diseases, Male/Penile Diseases/Balanitis/Balanitis Xerotica Obliterans
Record.Description: An atrophic and sclerotic condition of the head of the PENIS, glans penis. Sometimes it leads to stenosis and occasionally obliteration of the external meatal orifice.
